trans.cn: 拦截，阻截；抄截（对方的传球）；截断，中止（光等电磁辐射）；（线，面）截取，截断（部分面积、线、面）

sentences.c: It is illegal to intercept radio messages.
sentences.cn: 窃听无线电信息是违法的。

sentences.c: It seemed like an awful thing to do when they're bringing these falcons and hawks who were imported to intercept these people.
sentences.cn: 当他们带着猎鹰和鹰来拦截这些人时，这似乎是一件可怕的事情。

sentences.c: The constant a represents the vertical intercept, and b represents the slope of the consumption schedule.
sentences.cn: 常数a表示垂直截距，b表示消费计划的斜率。

words.cn: 拦截，截住；截断，截取；侦听，窃听

etymology.d: inter-,在内，在中间，相互，-cept,拿，握，词源同capable,capture.引申词义阻截，拦截。
词根词缀： inter-中间,之间,相互 + -cept-拿
